content.html: Want to hear about our refactoring adventures? We put together a nice short write-up (just 6,000 words) about our journey in modernizing the TypeScript codebase, and our migration to modules! devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/typ…
content.value:
Want to hear about our refactoring adventures?

We put together a nice short write-up (just 6,000 words) about our journey in modernizing the TypeScript codebase, and our migration to modules!

devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/typ…

content.html: TypeScript source code now uses ES modules 🎉 🔹 npm package is 46% smaller 🔹 Build times reduced by 10-25% 😲 The next likely step is to ship native ESM for even more wins 👍 e.g. making the CJS entrypoint a thin wrapper around a native ESM entrypoint will save 7 MB alone 🔥
content.value:
TypeScript source code now uses ES modules 🎉

🔹 npm package is 46% smaller
🔹 Build times reduced by 10-25% 😲

The next likely step is to ship native ESM for even more wins 👍

e.g. making the CJS entrypoint a thin wrapper around a native ESM entrypoint will save 7 MB alone 🔥
